main event: A reported sighting involved one unidentified silver object about the size of a basketball, observed to descend near railroad tracks and then disappear.
interesting points: The object was described as silver with no markings,The object appeared to descend on railroad tracks,The sighting occurred under clear weather conditions,12 witnesses in the area denied observing any objects,The report comes from a scanned document of Project Blue Book, part of a U.S. Air Force investigation.
sighted object: one silver object, approximately 8-12 inches in diameter
